sliderTitle1: Fox in Forex is the way for the successful traders.
sliderText1: Gain the opportunity to trade on financial markets with access to CFD assets.
sliderTitle2: Fox in Forex is chosen for its reliability and longevity.
sliderText2: Fox in Forex platform is developed with the consideration of financial security. It is confirmed by the countless number of satisfied customers, which demonstrates high quality of the offered services.
sliderTitle3: Full set of the instruments for effective income.
sliderText3: Unrestricted access to all financial instruments will help you benefit from maximum income on the financial market. These include stocks, indices, raw materials, precious metals.
sliderText4: Become our client and get a guaranteed trade on international financial market withour requotes and slippages.
whyForexTitle1: More than 3 years of flawless activity on the market.
whyForexText1: Thanks to its success over the entire period of operation, Fox In Forex has been recognized as a leader in the CFD trading industry.
whyForexText2: With Fox In Forex, accrual of spreads are intelligible. Financial transactions without requotes and slippages will bring customers the maximum possible income.
whyForexTitle3: We are chosen in the world - 6 awards for the best quality of service for traders.
whyForexText3: Over the 4 years of operation, the FoxInForex team has won honorary international awards and titles, which gives it the right to be considered one of the best brokerage companies in the world
whyForexText4: The withdrawal of earned funds from the account is carried out in just a few days and, most importantly, without loss.
whyForexText5: An expanded set of tools and advanced technologies of the new terminal will make it possible to accurately predict and analyze trading results in the financial markets.
whyForexText6: Take care of your time - register and earn fast.
benefitTitle1: Collaboration with the best financial holdings.
benefitText1: Fox In Forex partners include leading liquidity providers: Bank J.P. Morgan, Bank of America and Citibank.
benefitText2: Thanks to high-tech and modern server hardware, transactions are triggered in just 0.012 seconds.
benefitTitle3: Ability to choose your trading style.
benefitText3: With FoxInForex you can freely use various trading strategies: scalping, swing trading, hedging a transaction or any other strategy of your choice.
benefitText4: Fox In Forex platform clients trade in international financial markets with minimum spreads from 0.1 pips.
stepsText1: Registration will only take you a couple of minutes - this will allow you to start trading on your own terms.
stepsText2: To replenish your account without commission, use an electronic wallet or credit card.
stepsText3: Make real profit using all trading tools.
silverTitle: Start small: everything a beginner needs.
goldTitle: Expand your boundaries and your possibilities.
marketsSliderTitle: Access to interbank liquidity opens with Fox In Forex.
marketsSliderText: Fox In Forex is a direct path to the financial market, which provides its customers with guaranteed stability of transaction execution and accuracy of currency exchange rates.
openForYouTitle: Discover unlimited trading opportunities in popular financial markets.
openForYouText1: Changes in the exchange rate with its high liquidity allow you to conclude transactions with instant execution for any period.
openForYouText2: A new and promising direction of trading with high volatility will help to increase your income. Invest with Fox In Forex in popular cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ripple, Monero, etc.
openForYouText3: Trade stocks of the most famous companies. Tracking global changes in the world of stocks will allow you to more profitably distribute your assets in one of the most profitable markets.
instrumentsTitle: A wide selection of financial instruments.
instrumentsText1: Fox In Forex gives traders access to over 120 trading assets.
instrumentsText2: Choose instruments with maximum volatility and minimal spreads.
instrumentsText3: Analyze the global situation, predict the results of trading and get real income.
companySliderTitle: Fox In Forex is a reliable and stable financial broker for traders and private investors around the world.
companySliderteText: We are trusted by more than 370 thousand customers daily, making trading transactions using affordable financial instruments. Reliability, stability and security of cooperation - these are the qualities due to which traders choose us, and experts recognize the best in their field.
aboutTopTitle: A reliable broker - a satisfied client.
aboutTopText: We do everything to ensure that the work of the trader  brings maximum comfort and profit daily. A specially designed and technologically equipped terminal helps customers analyze and forecast markets, complete transactions with minimal spreads, and safely withdraw funds earned.
goalsText1: Optimization of all financial platform tools is a priority for the Fox In Forex broker. The introduction of an innovative trading platform and cost reduction has led to a reduction in accrued spreads and to minimize transaction time.
goalsText2: Fox In Forex is a broker that prepares beginners to making the most profitable transactions using their own theoretical materials and real-life examples. Learn to accurately predict asset price highs and lows with Fox In Forex.
posibilitiesText: Fox In Forex does not put its customers in the box. Traders have the opportunity to use any trading strategies of their choice. It is important for us that friendly and trusting relationships are built with each new user.
historyTitle1: Opening the first office and launching the product on the market.
historyText1: The first wave of users trusted the services of a team of brokers and opened their accounts on the basis of an innovative trading terminal.
historyTitle2: Recognition of traders and international experts.
historyText2: Fox In Forex was selected as the best broker in several honorary nominations at once: Best Europe Investment Broker, Best CFD Broker Europe and Best CFD Broker ASIA.
historyText3: The number of registered trading accounts crossed the mark of 200 thousand and continues to grow.
historyText4: The number of daily trading operations reached 2 million, and the amount of paid deposits exceeded $ 50 million. But this is not the limit. We continue to improve the platform and introduce new technological solutions that will soon please our customers.
platformTitle: Fox In Forex platform is an innovative brokerage approach for comfortable trading.
platformText: A high-speed terminal and the presence of hundreds of instruments open up opportunities for traders to accurately forecast exchange rates, analyze price movements, instantly complete transactions and monitor their results.
platformBottomTitle: Advantages of the Fox In Forex terminal:
